item.title: Vuforia Engine API
item.description: Company: PTC Duration: 2015-2021 Project Scope: Leading the design and development of the Vuforia Engine (native) API.

item.title: Entreprise AR Framework
item.description: Company: PTC Duration: 2020-present Project Scope: Development of a new high level, modular, scalable industrial AR framework used as the new software stack for all Vuforia Solutions (Instruct, Expert Capture, etc.
